physical_appearance: This is an ankle-length cheongsam that is long-sleeved. There is a collar present as well. There are no visible tears on the exterior of the cheongsam. There are light green and brown floral motifs appearing all over the cheongsam. The piping of the cheongsam runs from the collar to its left side, just below the point where its left sleeve begins.There is a slit present on the right side of the cheongsam.
sgcool_label_text: This is an ankle-length cheongsam with long sleeves, with light green and brown floral motifs with gold thread. The sleeves of the cheongsam are tapered at the ends and could be secured by snap buttons, to emphasise the slender arms of the wearer
title_text: Ankle-length cheongsam with brown netted fabric
subject_terms_1: dresses (garments) womenswear floral patterns allover patterns
subject_terms_2: Qipao Ethnic costume Women's clothing Motifs
